mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.site_id AS "siteId", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.module AS "module", a.name AS "name", a.image AS "image", a.href AS "href", a.target AS "target", a.description AS "description", a.keywords AS "keywords", a.sort AS "sort", a.in_menu AS "inMenu", a.in_list AS "inList", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", office.name AS "office.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office office ON office.id = a.office_id
mapper.select: select * from cms_category where parent_id = #{id} ORDER BY sort
select case when exists(select 1 from cms_category where parent_id = #{id}) then 1 else 0 end ${dual}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_category( id, parent_id, parent_ids, site_id, office_id, module, name, image, href, target, description, keywords, sort, in_menu, in_list, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{siteId}, #{office.id}, #{module}, #{name}, #{image}, #{href}, #{target}, #{description}, #{keywords}, #{sort}, #{inMenu}, #{inList}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_category SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, site_id = #{siteId}, office_id = #{office.id}, module = #{module}, name = #{name}, image = #{image}, href = #{href}, target = #{target}, description = #{description}, keywords = #{keywords}, sort = #{sort}, in_menu = #{inMenu}, in_list = #{inList}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
DELETE FROM cms_category WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
UPDATE cms_category SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
